author: Staff Reporter
text:
In a shocking incident, a 57-year-old man allegedly killed a one-and-a-half-year-old child at his house in Vanarapet here on Tuesday. The accused Velu is absconding.

Police said the accused was staying near the house of his relative Lourdumary and her husband Vinoth, a coolie labourer. The couple’s child Jegadeesan was playing at the house of Velu with his daughter Kousalya. Velu in a fit of rage picked up the child and banged the child’s head on the ground.

Lourdumary and Vinoth rushed Jegadeesan to hospital where doctors pronounced the child dead. Velu had been undergoing treatment for mental illness for the past three months, said the police.
title: Man kills child in a fit of rage
